actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the special dependency requirements for entitlement to husband's and widower's insurance benefits, so that benefits for husbands and widower's will be payable on the same basis as benefits for wives and widows.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the special dependency requirements for entitlement to husband's and widower's insurance benefits under Title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the special dependency requirements for entitlement to husband's and widower's insurance benefits, so that benefits for husbands and widower's will be payable on the same basis as benefits for wives and widows.
